job_title: Provider in Cabot, AR
pros: Mediocre pay and benefits. The only pro is the opportunity to work with patients in need and make a difference in their lives.
cons: Upper management is only concerned with making money rather than the quality of care provided to patients. Upper management has zero clinical knowledge which is reflected in the decisions made that have a negative impact on patient care. Very high turnover of staff due to the company’s lack of training and care for employees.
